summary: An Retexture of Locaster\'s Archer Armor! This time: White
descriptionHtml:
\"As some hunters hunt in forests , Other dense in snow\"-Cas The Blanc

As (not so) Popular request, But also my promise. I continu on the Retexture series of the armor! This time I\'m bringing you White! As ment to use in snowy spots!

I used PaintDOTnet to Create this, and each armor retexture of the series is using another tool! As the brown one used the Soften Portrait\' and \'hue and saturation\', This one was made by \'Curves\' and \'Sharpen\'! 

This is my second mod, I like making mods! Positive comments are welcome, As well as negative ones, Although I prefer the good ones!

NOTE: My Skyrim is not even starting up due my crappy computer and my ton of mods! If anyone could test this armor out and maybe upload a few pictures, it will be very much appreciated!

Check out my Brown Retexutre! 
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23872-1-1347386154.jpg[/img]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24722/

Original Armor: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22870

Credit to Locaster!
author: Casablancaz
